text:
While the Internet was fixated on Selena Gomez and The Weeknd's Coachella PDA, another hot celeb romance was cooking on festival grounds—Kendall Jenner and A$AP Rocky's. The on-and-off couple was spotted at the #WeedmapsOasis party together, E! News confirms.

It seems Jenner attended the event specifically to see her man. "As soon as she arrived, Kendall asked where [A$AP] was and went straight over to him," a source told E!. She apparently didn't leave his side after they finally met up.

"They danced together and were very couple-y. It was obvious to everyone," the source added. Jenner also reportedly took of Rocky's goggles and put them on herself—you know, middle school dance-style.

Later on that night when the temperatures dropped and Jenner got cold, Rocky was spotted rubbing her arms to keep her warm. "They were very cozy together," the insider told E!.

This is the latest of joint sightings between the two young style icons. After becoming linked last summer, the unofficial couple has been seen together at various occasions ranging from Kylie Jenner's birthday party to Couture Week in Paris to jewelry-shopping dates in NYC.
title: Kendall Jenner and A$AP Rocky Brought Their Romance to Coachella
